scripts.test: npm run test_core && npm run test_agency && npm run test_hq
scripts.build_travel: cd apps/travel && ember build --env production && echo `TZ=US/Pacific date` > dist/build_timestamp.txt && rm -rf dist/dist.zip; zip -q -r dist/dist.zip dist
scripts.build: npm run build_travel && npm run build_agency
scripts.watch: npm run watch_travel & npm run watch_agency & npm run watch_agency_devserver
scripts.build_ios: npm run build_travel && mkdir -p native/ios/www && cp apps/travel/dist/dist.zip native/ios/www;
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:db && npm run migrate:scripts
scripts.migrate:scripts: docker-compose exec server npm run migrate:scripts
scripts.migrate:examples: docker-compose exec server npm run migrate:examples
